full_summary:
### Dive Skiff Supply

#### Invitation to Bid

Public Works and Government Services Canada by way of solicitation FP197-220002/B invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the supply of one (1) Dive Skiff, one and a half meters in length, to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.

#### Requirements

* Vendor must submit an electronic bid using Canada Post's epost Connect for this solicitation only.
* Supplier to provide delivery of the Dive Skiff by April 30, 2023, to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.
* This is a one-time purchase, however there is an option for two additional Dive Skiffs to be used by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans for one year from the delivery of the first Dive Skiff.
* The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) without any specific requirements for security.

#### Bid Procedure

* Interested Suppliers can submit a bid electronicy using the epost Connect application found via the Canada Post website. Further information about the process can be obtained by contacting:
  [TPSGC.RPReceptiondessoumissions-PRBidReceiving.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.RPReceptiondessoumissions-PRBidReceiving.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Written or facsimile bids and those submitted in person may not be accepted.
* The Department retains the right to negotiate with Suppliers throughout the procurement process.

#### Attachment

The following attachments are related to this bid:
* [Attachment 1: Technical Specifications](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/30/6b1df34b9afddd793479a81ed90e2bb5/ABES.PROD.PW_XLV.B166.E8391.EBSU002.PDF),
* [Attachment 2: Commercial Directions](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/11/7849201eb74a4857602a2ca63fe464a4/ABES.PROD.PW_XLV.B166.E8391.EBSU000.PDF)
* [Attachment 3: Further Details](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/5fb625ab4d0210448dcef75e32acee6e/AB
